alert.note: Alert for Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 8:25PM CDT until July 18 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Winston County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 825 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Needmore, or near Haleyville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Haleyville, Lynn, Double Springs, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Ashbank, Brushy Lake, Poplar Springs, Ashridge, Corinth Rec Area, Needmore, Moreland, Winston Free State Barn, Smith Lake, Natural Bridge, Posey Field Airport, Hullett Branch, Clear Creek, Winston County Airport and Cane Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
